column1: I feel overwhelmed and stressed most of the time.
It's hard to focus on tasks due to anxiety.
I am feeling happy and content today.
Sometimes I struggle with feelings of loneliness.
I often feel a sense of accomplishment after completing my work.
I find it difficult to manage my emotions lately.
I am grateful for the support of my friends and family.
There are days when I feel hopeless and lost.
I enjoy spending time outdoors  it helps with my mood.
I feel a lot of pressure to meet everyone's expectations.
